posts.content:
Hi Rikki,
would like to attend for the both days, please add to the list, PM sent

Thanks Phil

Hi Rikki. I've sent you an email .. Hope you got it. Barry and Sandy Rickards 1960 Mango Combi 636 YUL . Inside for Saturday please.
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid ... =3&theater

brazilnut wrote:
garys67 wrote:
Email sent Ricky

Participation list (inside the show ground, 15 only!):

1. Graham Dean - 1954 deluxe
2. Brent Bukin - 1965 kombi
3. Claude Buisan - 1960 kombi
4. Rob Weyman - 1959 Kombi
5. Agpul ( andy pullen) - 1967 so42
6. Steve Williams - 1965 Dormobile (Sat)
7. Kate Mew - 1967 Deluxe (Sun)
8. Simon Spencer - 1966 13 Deluxe. (Sun)
9. Gary & Sally Collins - 1967 Kombi (Sun)
10. Billy & Elaine Willis - 1967 13 Deluxe (Sat)
11. Barry & Sandy Rickards - 1960 Mango Kombi (Sat)

Participation list (outside show ground, 20 approx):

1. Rikki James - 1954 deluxe
2. Scotty - 1952 kombi
3) Ben & Mo - Something rusty & low I expect
4) Kev & Amy - '60 Mango

Cheers
Mav
